headline: General Motors' Q4 US Sales Fall 7% Y/Y: Is EV Weakness the Reason?
summary: GM's Q4 U.S. sales fall 7% Y/Y as EV deliveries slid 43% after a tax-credit pull-forward, even as the automaker leads the market in 2025.

headline: The $160,000 Mechanic Job That Ford Can’t Fill
summary: KENT, Ohio—Just after 7 a.m. on a recent morning, Ted Hummel leapt up onto the front bumper of a 2019 Ford F-150 and reached under the hood to disconnect a pair of oxygen sensor connectors.  Hummel is confident he can do it in half the time.  Most mechanics at the Klaben Ford dealership in Kent, Ohio, hate messing with transmissions, the duffel-bag-shaped, 300-pound machines that transfer power to the vehicles’ wheels.

Most mechanics at the Klaben Ford dealership in Kent, Ohio, hate messing with transmissions, the duffel-bag-shaped, 300-pound machines that transfer power to the vehicles’ wheels.
